altCtrlUnblurs.message: Holding down Alt+Ctrl (in that specific order) unblurs

blurAmount.message: Amount of blur in pixels (between 2 and 10):

blurAmountOutOfBounds.message: Error: the amount of blur must be a number between 2 and 10.

defaultState.message: Behaviour of Blurbook when visiting Facebook

defaultState_remember.message: Same as last time I visited Facebook

extensionDescription.message: Stay clear of prying eyes on Facebook! Ctrl+B blurs/unblurs; holding down Alt+Ctrl (in that order) unblurs momentarily.

hoverUnblurs.message: Unblur when the mouse is over a message

optionsUsage.message: Usage: press Ctrl+B on Facebok or Messenger to blur/unblur the messages.
